title: A Movie and Television Grab Bag | The Watch
description:
The 1999 movie ‘The Blair Witch Project’ had the original viral marketing campaign (2:20). A crash course for the reality TV show ‘Vanderpump Rules’ (19:23). Plus: ‘What We Do in the Shadows,’ ‘Barry,’ ‘Jane the Virgin,’ and ‘The Twilight Zone’ (38:11).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Alyssa Bereznak, Juliet Litman, and Alison Herman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
